name: Derek Collison
overview:
Founder & CEO of Apcera Inc.
Derek is looking to deliver the next generation cloud platform. An industry veteran with over 20 yrs of experience, Derek designed and architected the industry's first Open PaaS, Cloud Foundry, while at VMware. Continuing his dream of a true next generation cloud platform, he founded Apcera. He has also held executive positions at Google and TIBCO.
